admin.gpu.col.name: Name
admin.gpu.config_desc: Limits apply to transcription/diarization tasks started from this server.
admin.gpu.hint: Tip: set 0.70â€“0.85 to keep VRAM headroom and avoid UI freezes.
admin.gpu.jobs_desc: Queued jobs will start automatically when a GPU slot is free. Scheduling respects priorities: transcription > diarization > quick LLM > deep LLM.
admin.gpu.subtitle: Monitor GPU usage, manage concurrency limits and job queue. (Auth will be added later.)

nllb.group.accurate_desc: Larger models with higher quality, slower and more memory-hungry.
nllb.models_desc: NLLB models are cached in the HuggingFace cache. After installation they will be marked as installed.
nllb.notes.base_3_3b: Very large model: a strong GPU is recommended for practical use.
nllb.notes.distilled_1_3b: Noticeably better quality at the cost of speed and higher requirements.
nllb.notes.distilled_600m: Best speed/quality tradeoff. Great for quick translations.
nllb.value.vram.generic: CPU OK â€¢ GPU: depends on size

np.audio_hint: If you provide an audio file, it becomes the project source. If not, after creation you will be taken to Analysis.
np.how.li1_html: After creation, a folder is created in data_www/projects/<project_id>.
np.how.li2_html: The folder stores project.json and (optionally) the chosen audio file.
np.how.li3_html: Transcription and Diarization use the project audio file (if one was added).
np.how.note: The active project is kept in the browser (localStorage). Creating a new project sets it active.
np.how.title: How it works
np.name_hint_html: The name is stored in project.json inside the project folder.

settings.llm_specialized_desc: Legal contracts, compliance checks and advanced reasoning.
settings.llm_vision_desc: OCR models for documents, invoices, bank statements, phone bills.

tts.piper.desc: Fastest TTS engine. CPU-optimized, ~50 languages. Models 15-60 MB each. MIT license.
tts.piper.recommendation: âœ… Recommended for most European languages. Best quality/speed ratio.
tts.mms.desc: Meta Massively Multilingual Speech â€” 1100+ languages. Widest language coverage. Automatic fallback for rare languages.
tts.mms.license_warn: âš ï¸ CC-BY-NC license â€” non-commercial use only.
tts.kokoro.desc: Very fast, highest voice quality. One 82 MB model supporting 9 languages. Apache 2.0.
tts.kokoro.recommendation: âœ… Best voice quality. Limited language set (9), but supported languages sound very natural.

finance.prompt.desc: Autonomous financial analysis of bank statements (PDF). Automatically detects bank, parses transactions, classifies risks and generates scoring.

finance.entities.hint: Flag entities as suspicious â€” they will be remembered in future analyses.
